author: daxian-dbw
body: There are some common properties that appear in almost all `.csproj` files, for example, `AssemblyOriginatorKeyFile`, `DelaySign`, `SignAssembly` and some configuration related properties. They should be moved to a shared `.props` file and be included in other `.csproj` files.
title: Move the common properties to a shared .props file that can be imported by all .csproj files
